gentleTouch.title1: FEEL THE GENTLE TOUCH OF OUR BRUSHES
gentleTouch.title2: ELEVATE YOUR MAKEUP ROUTINE WITH OUR TRAVEL KIT

contactUs.paragraph1: We are available 7 days a week for you, and if you have any questions, please email us at. You can also fill out the following form and we will get back to you within 48 hours.
contactUs.paragraph2: We at DR Pro Makeup Brushes try to provide insightful and accurate answers for all questions to the best of our ability. Please note that some special requests may take several days. Thank you for your interest and for reaching out to us.

precautions.paragraph1: These makeup brushes are made from natural hair and have undergone a thorough process of disinfection and sterilization to ensure cleanliness. However, it is important to note that natural hair may contain allergens that could potentially trigger allergies or sensitivities in some individuals.
precautions.paragraph2: If you have known allergies or sensitivities to natural hair or any materials commonly found in makeup brushes, we strongly recommend exercising caution when using our products. We advise conducting a patch test on a small area of your skin before full application to assess any potential reactions.
precautions.paragraph3: Should you experience any discomfort, irritation, or an allergic reaction, we urge you to discontinue use immediately and seek advice from a healthcare professional. Your safety and well-being are of utmost importance to us, and we encourage you to prioritize your health by taking necessary precautions.

return.title: Refund Policy
return.paragraph1: Thank you for choosing our makeup brushes. We appreciate you and strive to provide you with high-quality products. However, if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we have a return policy in place to ensure your satisfaction. Please review the following details:
return.paragraph2: Please note that this return policy is subject to change without prior notice. We recommend reviewing our policy periodically for any updates. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to our customer service team.
return.paragraph3: Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We value your satisfaction and strive to provide you with the best possible experience.

eligibility.a: Our return policy is valid for 14 days from the date of purchase.
eligibility.b: To be eligible for a return, the makeup brushes must be unused, in their original packaging, and in the same condition as when you received them.
eligibility.c: We do not accept returns on brushes that have been used or washed.

return.a: To initiate a return, kindly contact our customer service team via email within the 14 day return period.
return.b: Provide your order number, a description of the issue, and any relevant photos, if necessary.
return.c: Our customer service representative will guide you through the return process and provide you with further instructions.

refund.a: Upon receiving and inspecting the returned makeup brushes, we will process your refund.
refund.b: Refunds will be issued in the original payment method used for the purchase.
refund.c: Please note that shipping and handling charges are non-refundable.

exchange.a: We do not offer direct exchanges for makeup brushes.
exchange.b: If you wish to exchange an item, please follow the return process mentioned above and place a new order for the desired product.

damaged.a: In the unlikely event that you receive a damaged or defective makeup brush, please contact our customer service team immediately at email
damaged.b: Provide your order number, a description of the issue, and any relevant photos.
damaged.c: We will arrange for a replacement or refund, depending on your preference.

non-returnable.a: For hygiene and safety reasons, we cannot accept returns on used or washed makeup brushes.

aboutUs.paragraph1: Hello, my name is Daria Romanova. I am a professional make-up artist, the founder of DR Promakeup brand. I always believed that makeup should be a form of art, a means to express one's unique identity and to celebrate diversity. With this vision in mind, I set out to create a makeup brush brand that would revolutionize the industry.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our brand story is one of passion, innovation, and a deep-rooted belief in the power of individuality.
aboutUs.paragraph3: In a world where beauty is often defined by trends and conformity, our brushes emerged as a beacon of authenticity and self-expression.
aboutUs.paragraph4: DR Promakeup brand is built on the foundation of handcrafting each brush with meticulous care and attention to detail. Here, we believe that every stroke should feel like a work of art, enhancing the natural beauty of each individual. That's why we source only the finest materials, ensuring that our brushes are not only luxurious, but also ethically produced.
aboutUs.paragraph5: Join us on this transformative journey, where we celebrate the artistry of makeup and the power of self-expression. Let our handcrafted brushes be your trusted tools, guiding you on a path of creativity and authenticity.
aboutUs.paragraph6: My friend, I encourage you to hold onto your dreams with unwavering determination…work hard, stay focused, and never lose sight of the vision that fuels your soul.
aboutUs.paragraph8: The process of making handmade makeup brushes from natural hair involves carefully sourcing the finest natural hair, sorting and cleaning it, handcrafting the bristles, and assembling the brush. The natural hair is shaped and bundled to create the brush head, which is then attached to a handle made of durable materials, again, this is all done by hand by our skilled workers. This meticulous process ensures that the brushes are of premium quality and provide a unique touch of craftsmanship.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.paragraph1: Our Mission Is To Provide Beauty Enthusiasts With High-Quality Makeup Brushes Made From Natural Hair. We Believe That Natural Hair Brushes Offer Unparalleled Softness, Precision, And Versatility, Allowing Users To Achieve Flawless Makeup Application Effortlessly.
ourMission.paragraph2: By Choosing DR Promakeup You Are Not Only Investing In Exceptional Makeup Brushes But Also Supporting A Brand That Values Quality, Sustainability, And Ethical Practices. We Invite You To Experience The Difference That Natural Hair Brushes Can Make In Your Makeup Routine And Join Us In Celebrating Beauty In Its Most Natural Form.
